meanings.definition: The quality or state of being capable of being extruded.
meanings.sent1: The extrudability of the clay allowed the artist to create intricate shapes.
meanings.sent2: The extrudability of the toothpaste made it easy to squeeze out of the tube.
meanings.sent3: The extrudability of the playdough made it look like spaghetti!
meanings.sent4: The extrudability of the metal wire resembled a snake slithering through the hole.
meanings.sent5: The extrudability of the dough was so smooth and effortless, like magic.

meanings.definition: The ability of a substance to be forced through a small opening or die.
meanings.sent1: The extrudability of the plastic allowed it to be shaped into various forms.
meanings.sent2: The extrudability of the pasta dough made it perfect for creating different shapes of noodles.
meanings.sent3: The extrudability of the frosting made decorating the cake a fun and messy activity.
meanings.sent4: The extrudability of the thoughts in his mind felt like they were being squeezed through a narrow tunnel.
meanings.sent5: The extrudability of the glue made it easy to apply precisely where needed.
